name: intercellular
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between or among cells: His research was focused on cellular immune responses and intercellular communication in the immune system and the brain. The two cells were chosen to show the range of intercell variability.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cells were frequently separated from each other by intercellular spaces. The human brain has a hundred billion cells and a hundred trillion intercellular connections.Any random bacteria that enter the body also find their way into this inter-cell fluid.
